document_data.name: Caytran Halvasyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Caytran Halvasyn''' was a [[half-elf]] [[bard]] and leader of the [[Society of the Verdant Arrow]] in [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Description: Halvasyn was a wealthy noble and a merchant.
